ops.mr: Execute script #%3 in extern group %1 (priority %2/6) - Only if the script is not already running|_script(groupID)|priority|scriptID

ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:10}); // “I'd like to close down this shop,
but we got the regulars to think about.
I don't know what to do…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:3}); // “I'm sorry!
It's all rented out today!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:9}); // “Weapon and Meteor scared everyone else off,
but I'm sittin' here soused as usual.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:2}); // “Ooh, oohh…
Oh man, my head's burning up…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:1}); // “Looks like something's going on outside,
but we're too smashed to do anything…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:5}); // “Seems like you're all a little
too young to be in here.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:8}); // “It just isn't a party without Rude!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:6}); // Rude
“Hmm?
You too?”{PAUSE}“Then, take your mask off and come here.
That's our rule.”

dialogStrings:
“Looks like something's going on outside,
but we're too smashed to do anything…”

“Ooh, oohh…
Oh man, my head's burning up…”

“I'm sorry!
It's all rented out today!”

“The Shinra people are having a party
tonight, and we're all booked up.”

“Seems like you're all a little
too young to be in here.”

Rude
“Hmm?
You too?”{PAUSE}“Then, take your mask off and come here.
That's our rule.”
“It just isn't a party without Rude!”

“Weapon and Meteor scared everyone else off,
but I'm sittin' here soused as usual.”

“I'd like to close down this shop,
but we got the regulars to think about.
I don't know what to do…”
